item.title: Inadequate repair to emergency vehicle gate, 7th December
item.description:
See ref: 8246440. ref: 8275623. Inadequate repair to emergency vehicle gate on Mabley St. Too weak chain was used. Miscreants keep breaking links and leaving gate open, creating rat run from Marsh Hill to Kenworthy Road. Fix properly.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mabley Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ladder left unattended, 7th December
item.description:
There has been a ladder left unattended for a few days now this is on the path leading to Erith Station the ladder is leaning against a CCTV Camera This Ladder needs removing immediately it is a risk to public pedestrians and vehicles the ladder can tip over as itâ€™s very windy and can seriously injure someone pls deal with this asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bronze Age Way, Northumberland Heath, Greater London

item.title: Bus stop removed., 6th December
item.description:
I use this bus stop every week day morning to go to work in Stoke Newington. It was leaning the other day, I assumed due to vandalism. However, the next morning it was chucking down with rain and I discovered the bus shelter had been completely removed. An elderly resident was struggling to stand waiting for the bus and we both got soaked. Can you please explain what is going on with this shelter - if it has been purposefully removed I think it's disgraceful. There was no consultation or warning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Berkshire Road, Hackney Wick, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
